valueItems.name: Incident troubleshooting & remediation
valueItems.description: Proactive monitoring reduces severity and time-to-fix. 10 incidents/month × 2hr at exec rate.

valueItems.name: Zap building & optimization (TAM)
valueItems.description: 6 hrs/month TAM time. For someone with 290 zaps and a backlog of ideas, expert help is high leverage.

valueItems.name: Faster tenant response → improved retention
valueItems.description: Faster response → tenants stay. 10 retained tenants × $1,500 avg turnover cost.

valueItems.name: Fee reconciliation accuracy → recovered revenue
valueItems.description: Better error handling + audit trail catches discrepancies. 6 discrepancies/year × $1K avg.

valueItems.name: Task optimization → avoided overage costs
valueItems.description: General overage avoidance from task optimization. Baseline $2K current overages, growing with usage.

valueItems.name: Version history → faster incident recovery
valueItems.description: Version history enables instant recovery when API changes break zaps. Paul explicitly asked for this.

valueItems.name: Daily Ops Briefing - context gathering time saved
valueItems.description: 30 min/day × 20 workdays gathering context from property mgmt system, email, Asana. Agent delivers morning summary.

valueItems.name: Tenant email auto-response - manual replies avoided
valueItems.description: 60 routine tenant emails/month auto-handled. 10 min avg per response.

valueItems.name: Zap health monitoring - proactive issue detection
valueItems.description: Catches errors before they compound. 50% chance of preventing one major incident/year worth $15K.

valueItems.name: Work Order zap optimization - task headroom
valueItems.description: 20% task reduction on 154K tasks = 30K tasks/month saved. Creates headroom for summer growth.

valueItems.name: Lease management & renewal outreach staff time
valueItems.description: Proactive outreach 90 days before expiry. Auto-generated terms, follow-up sequence.

valueItems.name: Auto-triage & vendor dispatch time saved
valueItems.description: Smart triage, auto-dispatch to vendors, predictive maintenance from work order history.

valueItems.name: Maintenance cost optimization from smart routing
valueItems.description: Reduces management overhead and maintenance costs across all properties.

valueItems.name: AI-generated owner reporting
valueItems.description: Automated owner reporting — AI-generated narratives instead of manual spreadsheets.

valueItems.name: Team AI enablement — staff time savings
valueItems.description: Every team member AI-enabled. Staff training and tool adoption across the firm.

valueItems.name: Competitive positioning — client retention
valueItems.description: AI-forward positioning retains 2 clients/year × $10K value each.

valueItems.name: Dynamic pricing — optimized renewal rates
valueItems.description: Dynamic pricing intelligence from cross-property analytics.

valueItems.name: Cross-property analytics — portfolio optimization
valueItems.description: Better investment decisions from cross-property analytics. Occupancy trends, attention flags, maintenance patterns.
